title: Having issues when attempting to login
body: I've been having issues with signing in recently (almost a month now), whenever i enter my details it will say signing in for a bout a minute then say could not connect. I've checked my connection to see if there was any problems with it and it was fine, I followed the help instructions but that didn't help either. I had a look to see if anyone else had been having issues as well but i have only been able to find a discussion with similar problem but from around 9 months ago (when i was able to log in), just to be sure i followed some of the tips and advice people said in that discussion but again it did nothing. now im hoping to find someone with the same issue and seeing if he or she may help.

replies.body: I had that as well but I new that I was gona get a new laptop in a week and fixed

Have you tried uninstalling and reinstalling? Also try restart your modem router if you're on Wi-Fi (they should be regularly restarted). If you test your internet on [http://www.speedtest.net/](http://www.speedtest.net/) you should have decent ping but if you dont try to see if you can maximise internet speed on your laptop or modem router. 

These are just some ideas, but ive never had this problem so i cant know for sure.
I have tried everything and i finally discovered the problem, Sadly i have no clue how to fix it. Fortunately i know someone who does. Thx for the help though
